Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: My favourite seafood restaurant in Amsterdam. Dining here is always a pleasure with well cooked food and relaxing atmosphere. The menu here changes with the season and the restaurant practices sustainable fishing so the choice of fish …

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: As usual when of the best seafood Restaurents in Amsterdam, do not miss it specially the branch van bearle.. delicious food, the mixed grill was amazing and scampi salad was out of this world and as always service was great.. thank you seafood bar

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Quiet cozy spot for good seafood options. Fresh lobsters and oysters taken out of the aquarium for the order. Friendly staff. Dim calm ambient music. $$ on the price. Would recommend for date night as well.

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Excellent quality fish dishes, very nice service. I really like this brasserie! Will be back…

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Great place to who loves sea food. All the products are fresh and displayed at your will. I tried the Fruit du Mare and my wife the Mixed Grill. Both delicious and well served.

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Excellent place to have superb sea food. Not over the top elegant but still very upscale set up with good service. Always enjoy coming here.

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Great service and excellent food.  It is small and cozy.

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Good food, good service, a bit overpriced. The nice thing is that the kitchen is open until late. Very convenient for dinner before or after a concert in the  Concertgebouw

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Nice and quiet place. Always can find a place to taste a fresh seafood.

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: The food was super delicious, my mushroom risotto was creamy and flavorful. Shrimps, lobster and sea food really good. The service was very nice. I really enjoyed the meal in that place 💗

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: I visited this restaurant three times and every time I spent a wonderful time and enjoyed delicious food. The atmosphere was very good and the hall staff were friendly enough. The best thing with this restaurant is they are open after …

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Im coming to this place for years but never experienced such a rude service. We asked for another type of fries, the ones they always give us handmade, not from factory. And this woman almost got offended by it and even got angry. And it’s …

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Food was fantastic. Service wss first class.  My wife has a few food allergies which they were very sympathetic towards.  The waiters English was incredibly good.  I would highly recommend the Normandy oysters.  Overall it was a great dinning experience.

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: We've been coming here on occasion for many years now and returned for a festive lunch the other day. Quality is consistent, menu is lovely and the service honest and blissfully lacking servility. Maybe just have a look at the chairs, they get sticky ;-)

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Excellent service, nice personell, helpful, and the price is more than justified. The lobster, the vegetarian noodles ('main course'), and the cheese plate were delicious. Also, they have some nice wines. I definitely recommend this location. Don't go to Amsterdam and not visit the Brasserie Bark!

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Amazing restaurant. The ambiance gives you the feeling of a French restaurant. The food quality is impressive compared to the rest of the Dutch cuisine. We discovered that Pesto and salmon are great match.

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Served bread before giving menu to everyone except us. We are the only.asians there. Everyone else is white.    Can't help but feel we were discriminated.   Staff there should be educated on multiculturalism.

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: A charming cafe with sidewalk seating and a lovely seafood menu.  The waitstaff were friendly and attentive.  The food was tasty but not exquisite.  Very reasonably priced and convenient to Museumplein.

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: I ordered the fish soup, and I was not particularly impressed. The food there is rather expensive but the restaurant itself opens till midnight. Overall, okay experience, 3/5 stars.

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: We had a great meal last night, pleasant service and nice atmosphere.  Good value for price.  I would certainly recommend!

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: Good food.  But menu had a limited selection of seafood items.  Good service.  Took a look at the dessert list but didn't order.

Name: Brasserie Bark
Review Text: We went because of the great reviews online, but the meal we had a different plates for four different people was just satisfactory. We were disappointed.

Name: Brasserie Bark

Name: Brasserie Bark
